title: Beard Guyz Moustache Wax - Sculpt and Tame (1 oz)
features: MAXIMUM HOLD— Our Moustache Wax is thick and strong. Waxy and pliable enough to hold your ‘stache up all day without crusty residue
GUITAR PICK APPLICATOR INCLUDED—Use the guitar pick applicator to scoop out the perfect amount of Wax for your moustache so your fingers and nails stay mess-free. Rock on
NOURISHING INGREDIENTS— Lets you craft your style while being kind to your facial hair. This Wax is packed with shea butter, coconut oil, vitamin E, and jojoba oil for long-lasting hydration

CHEMISTRY + CRAFTSMANSHIP – As true beard guys, we spend an enormous amount of time, in house, developing men’s beard care products that we personally use. Our products have to work better than anything else on the market or we won’t offer them to you

OUR GUARANTEE TO YOU—If you are not 100% satisfied with this product, we will cheerfully refund your purchase price, no questions asked. We pride ourselves on providing the best customer care available. Contact us anytime through Amazon for assistance
